metadata.name: feed the astray!
metadata.description:
Fed the animals at home? Good. Fed the animals in the street? Nice! Now feed the ones in the sewage!


This artwork is created by cutting and pasting parts of four paintings. I also used drawing techniques in some portions of the artwork. I wanted to draw attention to stray animals in a humorous way.

 
Paintings used:  

Greek Girls Picking up Pebbles by the Sea - Frederic Leighton  

Saint Sebastian - Guido Reni  

Paris street, Rainy Day - Gustave Caillebotte  

The Little Street - Johannes Vermeer
